iv.copy: Cover up to R10 000 for the non-standard accessories fitted in your car, excluding its sound system. Once your policy is active, you can increase your cover amount through your online dashboard.

brandOverrides.copy: Cover up to R10 000 for the non-standard accessories fitted in your car, excluding its sound system. Once your policy is active, you can increase your cover amount through our call centre on 0861 33 93 39.

Cover up to R10 000 for the non-standard accessories fitted in your car, excluding its sound system. Once your policy is active, you can increase your cover amount through our call centre on 0861 60 01 24.

Dekking tot R10 000 vir die nie-standaard toebehore wat in jou kar aangebring is, uitsluitend die klankstelsel. Sodra jou polis aktief is, kan jy jou dekking deur ons kontaksentrum by 0861 477 911 verhoog.

Cover up to R10 000 for the non-standard accessories fitted in your car, excluding its sound system. Once your policy is active, you can increase your cover amount through our call centre on 0861 555 580.

iv.copy: Cover for damages caused to your car due to a hailstorm.

brandOverrides.copy: Dekking vir skade aan jou kar wat deur haelstorms veroorsaak word.

iv.copy: Cover against risks such as civil commotion, public disorder, strikes, riots and terrorism in South Africa.

brandOverrides.copy: Dekking teen risiko’s soos burgerlike oproer, openbare wanorde, stakings, betogings en terrorisme in Suid-Afrika.

iv.copy:
The use of a rental car should your car be undrivable or stolen, and is dependent on your cover type.

Quote is based on manual transmission car hire option (Kia Picanto or similar). Once your policy is active, option can be upgraded through your online dashboard.

brandOverrides.copy:
Die gebruik van ŉ gehuurde motor as jou kar nie rybaar is nie of gesteel word, en dit hang af van jou tipe dekking.

Die kwotasie is gebaseer op handrat motoropsies (Kia Picanto of soortgelyk). Sodra jou polis aktief is, kan die opsie deur ons kontaksentrum by 0861 477 911 opgegradeer word.

iv.copy: Offers benefits such as towing in case of a mechanical or electrical breakdown, jump starting your flat battery, or changing your flat tyre.
In the event of a claim, your car's canopy will be covered for the average amount that it would sell for today.

brandOverrides.copy: Indien jy eis, sal jou bakkie se kappie gedek word vir die algemene prys waarvoor die kappie gekoop sal word vandag.

iv.copy:
Select this option to increase your liability cover to a maximum of R5 million, instead of the default of R2.5 million, for damages caused to someone else’s car or property.

Once your policy is active, higher liability cover is available through your online dashboard.
iv.description: Increase Third-Party Liability cover to R5 million

Sodra jou polis aktief is, sal hoër aanspreeklikheidsdekking deur ons kontaksentrum beskikbaar wees.
brandOverrides.description: Verhoog Derdeparty aanspreeklikheidsdekking tot R5 miljoen

iv.copy: Provides you with cover for loss or damage to another party's property, during the period of insurance, for which you are legally liable.

brandOverrides.copy: Bied jou dekking vir skade aan ‘n ander party se besittings, tydens die versekerde tydperk, waarvoor jy wetlik aanspreeklik is.
Provides you with cover for loss or damage to another party's property, during the period of insurance, for which you are legally liable.

iv.copy:
A Guardian Angel on Call benefit, available through the 1st for Women app. 
The panic button assists with alerting external help during emergencies, for example, 
a hijacking and any other emergency where you feel unsafe. 
You can share the benefit with the regular driver of the car and up to five family 
and household members.
iv.description: Guardian Angel on Call: Panic button

iv.copy:
Benefits
  • Access to a mobile crash detector.
  • Emergency medical assistance.
  • An authorised tow truck that you can track to your exact location after an accident.
  • Roadside assistance (Flat tyre, battery, or if you run out of fuel).
  • A lift when your vehicle is towed. Limited to the metro area where the incident occurred.
  • A Guardian Angel to wait with you until help arrives.
  • Trip monitoring service that allows your trip to be monitored by our call centre so you can reach your destination safely.
  • Our claims team will immediately be notified of your accident.
  • Share the benefit with the regular driver of the car and up to five family and household members.
iv.description: Guardian Angel on Call: 24/7 Accident and Roadside Assistance

iv.copy:
Benefits
  • Access to an ambulance if you need emergency medical assistance.
  • An authorised tow truck that you can track to your exact location.
  • Roadside assistance (flat battery, if you run out of fuel out, or flat tyre).
  • A lift to wherever you need to go if your car is towed. Limited to the metro area where the incident occurred.
  • A Guardian Angel to wait with you until help arrives.
  • Trip monitoring service that allows your trip to be monitored by our call centre so you can reach your destination safely.
Terms and conditions online
iv.description: Guardian Angel on Call: 24/7 Accident and Roadside Assistance

iv.description: Guardian Angel on Call: 24/7 Accident Assistance

iv.copy: When we receive an impact alert, a call will be made to the regular driver. Should there be no response, emergency medical responders will be dispatched to the GPS location where the signal or notification originated. If the regular driver confirms that no help is needed, we will not send emergency assistance.

Gives you access to towing services after an accident or breakdown to the nearest approved panel beater/yard and advice on the collision procedure. Also included is assistance with a flat battery or tyre and if you run out of fuel.

brandOverrides.copy: As jy jouself in 'n padpenarie bevind, kan jy op ons knoppie druk. Hierdie bystand is tot jou redding sou jou kar onklaar raak langs die pad of na 'n ongeluk. Hulp sal ook kom as jy gestrand is met 'n pap wiel of 'n battery wat sukkel en selfs as jy sonder petrol gaan staan.

Gives you access to authorised towing services, which you can track to your exact location (after an accident or breakdown), to transport your car to the nearest approved panelbeater/yard. Also included is assistance with a flat battery or tyre and if you run out of fuel.

iv.copy: Gives you access to towing services after an accident to the nearest approved panel beater/yard and advice on the collision procedure.

brandOverrides.copy: Gives you access to towing services after an accident to the nearest approved panel beater/yard and advice on the collision procedure.
Bied jou toegang tot wegsleepdienste na ‘n ongeluk wat insluit die insleep van jou kar na die naaste goedgekeurde paneelklopper/werf en ons sal jou bystaan met ongeluksadvies.
Gives you access to authorised towing services, which you can track to your exact location after an accident, to transport your car to the nearest approved panelbeater/yard.

iv.copy: Cover for chipped, cracked or damaged window/glass on your car.

brandOverrides.copy: Dekking vir skade aan die venster/glas van jou kar.
